body: Cutpurses are minor thieves (often youths) who earn money from petty crimes such as pickpocketing or stealing items from market stalls. They are typically 1st-level commoners (NPC Codex 256), experts (NPC Codex 260), or rogues (NPC Codex 144) with 1 rank in Perception, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
name: Cutpurses
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Rooms And Teams/Rooms and Teams/Teams/Cutpurses
